General.Name: Sweetgreen Inc
General.Description: Sweetgreen, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates fast-casual restaurants serving healthy foods prepared from seasonal and organic ingredients. The company also accepts orders through its online and mobile ordering platforms, as well as sells gift cards that can be redeemed in its restaurants. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 3101 West Exposition Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90018
